name: Synth Drive
description:
Controls:

A or D or Left or Right Arrows to control the vehicle

__________________________________________________________________________________________

Goal:

Collect as many pickups as you can but beware there is fuel limit but you can collect fuel tanks to fill up the fuel

__________________________________________________________________________________________

90's Retro Synthwave music endless drive game with retro car and 5 extra Looks to play.

Hope you enjoy it <3
